```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(gapminder)
library(tidyverse)



p1 <- gapminder %>% 
      filter(country == "Canada") %>% 
      select(lifeExp, 
             year) %>% 
      ggplot(aes(x = year, 
                 y = lifeExp)) +
      geom_line()



p2 <- gapminder %>% 
      filter(country == "China") %>% 
      select(lifeExp, 
             year) %>% 
      ggplot(aes(x = year, 
                 y = lifeExp)) +
      geom_line()


list1 <- list(p1, p2)

names(list1) <- c("plot1","plot2")

```

```{r message = FALSE}
list1
```
